rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My older brother... Elnoth is his name...
he became a Driver!

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0002
rows.name: And then he enlisted in the Superbian army!

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
...Huh?
But what kind of weapon did my
older brother's Blade have?

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If it was an Axe or a Lance,
he'd be good at attacking enemies.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But he'd have to be careful not to draw their attention,
'cause it'd be dangerous if they all targeted him at once.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0006
rows.name:
If it was a Ball,
he'd be good at healing
his injured allies.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0007
rows.name:
He'd especially have to watch the health
of allies with Hammers or Katanas.

rows.label: tlk41100152_01_msg0008
rows.name:
I know a lot, right?
My older brother and I studied together!
